TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., The Austin Papers, (Austin: University of Texas Press, 1927), 3 vols., Vol 3, pp. 426
TEI.2.document_title: Robert Triplett to Stephen F Austin, 08-31-1836

barker_notes.barker_summary: Robert Triplett to Austin, August 31, 1836. Misunderstanding concerning first loans to Texas. Able argument for the lenders. (Omitted.)
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., The Austin Papers, (Austin: University of Texas Press, 1927), 3 vols., Vol 3, pp. 426
